0.text: Innate: After casting an ability, Taric's next two basic attacks within 4 seconds gain  100% total attack speed, each dealing 25 − 93 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus armor) bonus magic damage and reducing the  cooldowns of his basic abilities by 1 second, as well as refreshing Bravado's duration on the first attack.
Passive: Taric stores a charge of Starlight's Touch periodically, up to a maximum at once.  Bravado's empowered attacks grant one charge.

1.text: Active: Taric  heals himself and all nearby allied champions for 30 (+ 20% AP) (+ 1% of Taric's maximum health) per stored charge at the time of cast, up to a maximum of 150 (+ 100% AP) (+ 5% of Taric's maximum health) at 5 charges.

0.text: Passive: Taric gains  bonus armor and forms a  tether between him and the ally bound by Bastion. While the tether persists, the ally also gains the bonus armor and Taric's abilities are mimicked to them, though the effects do not stack.

1.text: Active: Taric  shields himself and the target allied champion for 2.5 seconds, binding them with Bastion.

2.text: Taric can self-cast to shield himself; if he is untethered, this will instead target the nearest ally. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.

0.text: Active: Taric projects a beam of starlight in the target direction that erupts after a 1 second delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area and  stunning them for 1.25 seconds.
Active: Taric calls down a star from above that descends to him over 2.5 seconds. Afterwards, Taric and all nearby allied  champions become  invulnerable for 2.5 seconds.

1.concerningText: Passive: Taric stores a charge of Starlight's Touch periodically, up to a maximum at once.  Bravado's empowered attacks grant one charge.

2.concerningText: Passive: Taric gains  bonus armor and forms a  tether between him and the ally bound by Bastion. While the tether persists, the ally also gains the bonus armor and Taric's abilities are mimicked to them, though the effects do not stack.
Active: Taric  shields himself and the target allied champion for 2.5 seconds, binding them with Bastion.

3.concerningText: Active: Taric projects a beam of starlight in the target direction that erupts after a 1 second delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area and  stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

0.concerningText: Passive: Taric stores a charge of Starlight's Touch periodically, up to a maximum at once.  Bravado's empowered attacks grant one charge.

Passive: Taric gains  bonus armor and forms a  tether between him and the ally bound by Bastion. While the tether persists, the ally also gains the bonus armor and Taric's abilities are mimicked to them, though the effects do not stack.

1.concerningText: Active: Taric  shields himself and the target allied champion for 2.5 seconds, binding them with Bastion.

+30 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies deal 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies deal 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 15% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage (stops if you are below 30% of your maximum health). Additionally, if they are below 50% of their maximum health, gain 35% bonus movement speed while moving towards them.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 15% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as  true damage (stops if you are below 30% of your maximum health). Additionally, if they are below 50% of their maximum health, gain 35% bonus movement speed while moving towards them.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
